activities.name: Copy data from ADLS to New table

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT P.ProductId,P.ProductName,P.UnitPrice,S.InvoiceNum,S.Sales
FROM Products P LEFT JOIN  SalesTran S
ON P.ProductId = S.ProductId
